title: Castlevania game quiz
description: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night is a groundbreaking 1997 action-adventure game by Konami. Known for its non-linear gameplay, atmospheric design, and RPG elements, it follows Alucard as he explores Dracula's castle, battling monsters and uncovering secrets. It's a genre-defining classic.

Pick one character
questions.title: Pick one your favorite character
questions.description: Alucard, Dracula’s son, is the main protagonist in Symphony of the Night, fighting to end his father's reign. Richter Belmont is the previous hero who falls under Dracula's control. Maria Renard aids Alucard, offering support and guidance with her magical abilities.

questions.title: A Familiar question?
questions.question: Select your Familiar team
questions.description: Alucard's familiars include the Fairy (heals and guides), the Demon (attacks foes), the Ghost (collects items), the Bat (aids in navigation), and the Sword (fights alongside). Each provides distinct support to enhance gameplay.

questions.title: High agility attacks
questions.question: In Symphony of the Night, which of the following enemies is known for its high agility and leaping attacks?
In Symphony of the Night, which boss is located in the “Cave” area and is known for attacking with tentacles and summoning smaller enemies?
questions.title: Cave boss
questions.description: The Cave in Symphony of the Night is a subterranean area with eerie, rock-filled environments. It features treacherous terrain, including collapsing platforms and powerful enemies. The area is home to the boss Scylla, known for its tentacle attacks and challenging battle.

questions.question: In Symphony of the Night, which boss in the “Castle Keep” manipulates the castle's magic?
questions.title: Castle Keep
questions.description: The Castle Keep in Symphony of the Night is a formidable area filled with dark, gothic architecture and powerful enemies. It serves as the final segment of Dracula's castle, featuring challenging encounters, including the boss Shaft, and leading to the climax of the game.
